main

Class LibrarySearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.LibrarySearch

  • public class LibrarySearch
extends java.lang.Object

    Library Search Class

    The library search class adds, checks, prints, and searches records in the library.
    Since:
    12-02-15

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LibrarySearch()

      adds book to list and adds keywords to hash map

      adds journal to list and adds keywords to hash map

      Adds keywords to Hash Map.

      adds library to specified text file

      checks to see if the call number can be added to the object

      Prints all of the books and journals from the library
      void search(java.lang.String keywords, java.lang.String callNumber, int start, int end)
      searches in the references list for the book and journal lists for the specified fields and prints results
      java.util.ArrayList<Reference> searchHashMap(java.lang.String[] keywords)
      Searches Hash Map for keywords and returns library of results

                        int year)
        checks to see if the call number can be added to the object
        Parameters:
        callNum - Call Number
        year - Year
        Returns:
        true if call number can't be added

      • print

        public void print(java.util.ArrayList<Reference> lib)
        Prints all of the books and journals from the library
        Parameters:
        lib - List of objects to be printed

      • addToHashMap

        public void addToHashMap(java.lang.String[] keywords)
        Adds keywords to Hash Map. If the map doesn't contain one of the words, the word is added to the Hash map along with a new array to keep track of the objects that contain the keyword. Then adds the index of the last added object to each of its keywords.
        Parameters:
        keywords - Keywords

      • searchHashMap

        public java.util.ArrayList<Reference> searchHashMap(java.lang.String[] keywords)
        Searches Hash Map for keywords and returns library of results
        Parameters:
        keywords - Keywords to search
        Returns:
        list of objects found

      • searchRecords

        public java.util.ArrayList<Reference> searchRecords(java.util.ArrayList<Reference> lib,
                                                    java.lang.String callNum,
                                                    int start,
                                                    int end)
        searches the library for the specified fields and adds results to a temporary library which is returned
        Parameters:
        lib - temporary library of results
        callNum - Call Number
        start - Start Year
        end - End Year
        Returns:
        list of objects found

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String keywords,
                   java.lang.String callNumber,
                   int start,
                   int end)
        searches in the references list for the book and journal lists for the specified fields and prints results
        Parameters:
        keywords - Keywords to search
        callNumber - Call number to search
        start - Start year to search
        end - End year to search
